name: Diamenty
overview: Diamenty is a Boulder Dash variant. The player must collect the designated number of diamonds and reach the exit doors before the time runs out. The task is made difficult by falling rocks, growing magma, walls and bugs. The equipment includes explosives, which may destroy the thinnest type of the wall or kill a bug. Killed bug turns into diamonds. Two types of doors require a same color key to open it. The game features 100 levels and built in editor.
